definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu

sentences.english: Irish is constitutionally recognised as the first official language of the State.
sentences.chinese: 本質上國家承認愛爾蘭語作爲官方第一語言。

sentences.english: But O Ciardha believes the Irish language will survive.
sentences.chinese: 不過歐康裘貝相信愛爾蘭語仍將繼續存活。

sentences.english: Facilitate the public who want to use Irish when dealing with the State.
sentences.chinese: 爲當根政府打交道時想使用愛爾蘭語的公衆提供便利。
